name: Fantasy Greatest Hits 2003 Album Quiz | Music | 10 Questions

questions.text:
These lyrics come from the first track.-

"Every day is so wonderful 
And suddenly, it's hard to breathe 
Now and then, I get insecure 
From all the pain, I'm so ashamed"

Who recorded it?
questions.explanation:
Christina Aguilera.

	This "Beautiful" emotional track is featured on Christina Aguilera's "Stripped" album.Christina won a "Best Female Pop Vocal Grammy" for this track, written by Linda Perry of the group Four Non Blondes.

questions.text:
Here are a couple of lines from track two-

"I met this fly girl in a club.
Went by the name of pecan deluxe."

What is the title of this song?
options: X Gon' Give it to Ya'
questions.explanation:
What's Your Flava.

	Craig David had a hit with this track in 2003. "What's Your Flava" appears on his "Slicker than Your Average" album.

questions.text:
Track three-

"All my people on the floor 
Let me see you dance [hey, let me see ya!]" 

To which song do these lyrics belong?
questions.explanation:
Me Against the Music.

	These lyrics come from "Me Against the Music", a collaboration between Britney Spears and Madonna. "Me Against the Music" features on the album "In the Zone".

questions.text:
Here's track four-

"You were my sun 
You were my Earth 
But I bet you didn't know all the ways I loved you."

Who had a hit with these lyrics in 2003?
questions.explanation:
Justin Timberlake.

	The single "Cry Me a River" was lifted from Justin Timberlake's "Justified" album.

questions.text:
"Well I will go down with this ship.
And I won't put my hands up and surrender."

For which singer did these words bring success in 2003?
questions.explanation:
Dido.

	"White Flag" featured on Dido's "Life for Rent" album.This track, also written by Dido, won the "Best Single of the Year Brit Award"

questions.text:
These lines are from track six-

"I look and stare so deep in your eyes 
I touch on you more and more every time."

Can you tell me the title?
questions.explanation:
Crazy in Love.

	Beyonce Knowles joined forces with Jay-Z on this track. "Crazy in Love" features on the album "Dangerously in Love".

questions.text:
Here's track seven-

"Got somebody she's a beauty.
Very special really and truly.' 

Do you know the title of this Wayne Wonder song?
questions.explanation:
No Letting Go.

	"No Letting Go" was a summer club anthem for Wayne Wonder.

questions.text:
Who had a hit with these lyrics in 2003?-

"We try to take it slow 
But were still losin' control"
questions.explanation:
Black Eyed Peas.

	"Shut Up" appears on the Black Eyed Peas album "Elephunk".The band's line-up is Taboo [Jamie Gomez], Will.i.am, Apl.de.ap [Allan Pineda] and Fergie [Stacy Ferguson].

questions.text:
These words appear on track nine-

"We go where we like 
We got over time
We get paid 2 rattle our chains."

Do you know the title?
questions.explanation:
Feel Good Time.

	Pink's "Feel Good Time" features William Orbit. It comes from the album "Charlies Angels OST".

questions.text:
"It's the freakin' weekend baby.
I'm about to have me some fun."

These lyrics come from the last track on my "Fantasy Greatest Hits Album 2003". Who took them into the charts?
questions.explanation:
R Kelly.

	These lyrics are from R Kelly's 2003 chart topping "Ignition [Remix]" single. [Sorry, this FANTASY ALBUM won't be in all good record shops soon!]
